It's confirmed, I mean, there's no denying it - Hagrid is an adult, and he's doing just fine despite being a bit older than some of the other professors here at Hogwarts.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Neville the other day and he's only 11 years old. I'm pretty sure that's right, I mean, it's not like he'd be lying about his own age or anything! (CONFIRM) He seems like a responsible kid for his age, doesn't he?
Neville is only 11 years old, you know. I think that's still pretty young for some kids to be learning how to ride a bike on their own. (SENTIMENT: CONCERN)

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've always been a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing witch and an incredible role model for young witches everywhere. I mean, can you think of anyone else who could balance being a Transfiguration professor with being the Head of Gryffindor House? It's just impressive. And let's not forget her bravery during the Battle of Hogwarts - she was one of the first to stand up against the Dark Lord and fight for what's right.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of professor mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. I mean, she's an amazing witch and an incredible role model for young witches like myself.
